column4: chmod u+w /etc/wvdial.conf <--- I typed this but it said operation not permitted.. What do I need to do to be able to edit /etc/wvdial.conf?
gksu gedit /etc/wvdial.conf for gui or sudo nano /etc/wvdial.conf for cli
I told you how to edit it alreadt
root is locked on ubuntu use sudo instead
